product.title: BKIND Shampoo Bar in Multi
product.body_html: Wash your hair gently and with natural ingredients by using BKIND's moisturizing shampoo bar. The thick foam it produces cleanses your hair and scalp, while leaving a wonderful fresh scent of orange and eucalyptus. Perfect for all hair types. 55 g (approximately 40 uses).
